General.Name: Highbridge Multi-Strategy Fund
General.Description: Highbridge Multi-Strategy Fund Limited is a close-ended fund of hedge fund launched and managed by BlueCrest Capital Management (UK) LLP. It invests in a fund of hedge funds which invests in public equity, fixed income, commodity, and currency markets across the globe. The fund seeks to invest in securities of companies operating across diversified sectors. It primarily invests all of its assets in AllBlue Limited, which in turn invests in BlueCrest and Systematica funds. The fund was previously known as BlueCrest AllBlue Fund Limited. Highbridge Multi-Strategy Fund Limited was formed on April 21, 2006 and is domiciled in Guernsey, Channel Islands.
General.Address: Nova North, London, United Kingdom, SW1E 5BY
